name: Grafix Softech
overview:
After graduating with honors from the Indian Institute of Technology, Tej Kohli moved to America to pursue his dream of starting his own company. In 1993, Mr. Kohli created his first company, Grafix Softech, an interactive software firm. Grafix soon launched a comprehensive range of online services including wed designing and online marketing solutions, which gained an excellent reputation amongst its client base as one-point-source for launching an online business.

In the late 90s, when e-commerce was getting started, Grafix Softech developed a cutting-edge payment gateway software on online transactions. Within a few years, Grafix Softech became one of the leading internet marketing and e-commerce consulting companies across the world.

After establishing a strong clientele in South America, the company shifted its head office to San Jose, Costa Rica. In 2009, Grafix expanded into India and opened an office in Hyderabad. The company has also recently announced its new online gaming software ventures in South America and the innovative Grafix Visitor Tracker which will deliver real time insight into website traffic.
